verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Rejoice in the Lord always
And again I say rejoice
Rejoice in the Lord always
And again I say rejoice

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Rejoice Rejoice
And again I say rejoice
Rejoice Rejoice
And again I say rejoice

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Let your moderation be known to men. The Lord is at hand.
Let your moderation be known to men. The Lord is at hand.
At hand, at hand; the Lord is at hand.
At hand, at hand; the Lord is at hand.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Rejoice in the Lord always
And again I say rejoice.
